1.content:
It was the start of Spring Break. Todd's parents have left to go on a cruise for the week, and both Todd and Ian have planned on going to the beach to find themselves some hot girls. Todd's younger sister, Rebecca, was staying home in spite of being able to tag along.

"You all set?" Todd asked.
"Yup. Ready when you are."

The two walked down the hall. Rebecca was in the bathroom taking a shower. "See ya, sis!" Todd yelled through the door.

"See ya!" Rebecca said back faintly.
"Alright, time to go."

The two of them slipped on their shoes, but before they could even get a chance to open up the front door, both of their vision went severely blurry and both got light headed. It stopped as soon as it started though, except... it appeared the two were in the different environment. Then they got their vision back and noticed what had happened. They have mysteriously shrunk down. Pretty tiny too.

"......D-Dude, what the hell is this?" Ian said panicly.
Todd was speechless. He look all around. The door stretched up for miles. What used to be just mere steps away were like mountains faded off in the distance. "This has to be a dream." He pinched himself. Hard. Harder. Even harder until he yelled out in pain.
"This isn't good man, what the hell happened?!"

A noise could be heard off into the distance. The bathroom door was opening, and out came the largest thing imaginable: Rebecca. She walked out with just a towel on, looking in the direction of the front door. Her long slender, but now massive legs began swinging their way towards the two boys. Each footfall shook the hardwood floor causing the two to lose their footing and fall. They screamed out trying to get their attention but then stopped. Her Star Destroyer sized foot was coming at them. They tried scrambling away.

BOOOOOOOM

The two looked up. They were between her big and second toe. They were like skyscrapers, but they looked past that. Rebecca stretched into the sky with her slender legs, all the way up to her bush. That it as far as they can see.

"Good," her voiced boom, "Alone at last." She locks the door, and then she stepped away, leaving the two boys at the front door. They started running after her desperately. She went around closing all the blinds and curtains all over the house. When she made her way back towards Todd and Ian, she took off her towel, balled it up, and tossed it into the bathroom. Leaving from where the last look left off, she continued to stretch into the sky with her well-rounded ass, curvy back, slim wait, b-cup breasts, and with her cute face with medium-long light brown hair. She was an absolute Goddess to the two flea sized boys.They stared up at her with amazement.

"...How small do you think we are?" Ian asked.
They looked around and saw stray particles of dust that were the size of boulders.
"We're dust... We're just fucking dust to her..." Todd said with anguish as he fell to his knees.

Rebecca, meanwhile, got out her cellphone and called up her friend Alexis.

"Hey, Alexis... Yeah, I'm all alone at home now so hurry up and get over here... Yeah we have total privacy. All the windows are locked and completely covered. The doors are locked too... Great, see you soon."

The two fleas heard this. They were in deep shit.

As the two began their journey to the livingroom. Rebecca was setting up the livingroom for a nice long relaxing break. She turned on the AC to a low setting, flipped the radio on to a pop station. All the meanwhile, Todd and Ian have only made it a third of the way to the center of the livingroom, where Rebecca was now sitting down on the floor, reading a magazine on the coffee table.

A loud, thundering noise filled the house. The doorbell. Rebecca quickly got up, and made her way to the door, walking over the two helpless fleas who lost their footing to her footfalls. She looked through the hole on the door, then went to the side and unlocked the door. Alexis quickly came in with a lot of luggage, shut the door behind her and locked it.

"Hey!" she said loudly, "I see you've already started, haha!" She kicked off her orange flip flops that show some serious wear and tear with dirt stains on the top and bottom. Both girls began walking their way to the livingroom, putting the boys in danger once more. They fell again from the earthquakes and this time Alexis's right foot was descending on top of them. Their screams were cut on by the mere slaps of the girls feet on the floor which were like cracks of thunder to the flea sized boys. Luck spared them again. They fell beneath the arc of Alexis's pink toes. They instantly were hit with a rush of foot odor. They were gasping for air from the intensity alone. The foot ascended up and traveled forward. The girls giggled and made small talk as Alexis began to strip down. Her shirt came off, revealing full c-cup breasts held back by a purple bra. Her shorts came off, and along with a g-string. Then she released her imprisoned breasts from her bra. All artlicles of clothing were tossed to the side next to her duffle bag. Alexis had plump feet, curvy calves, thighs, and ass. Her crotch is clean shaven. Her belly and back are more flat from baby fat. Her breasts protuded out of her chests like mountains. Here face has curvy cheeks with a big smile. Her black hair extends down to her shoulders. She's also a few inches shorter than Rebecca.

The two Goddesses take out assortments of food and miscellaneous items and set on the floor across from each other, feet to feet, using the coffee table as their main point of interest. Alexis has her breasts resting on the table's surface.

The two flea sized boys, watching from afar, have massive hard-ons. The sight is just unbelievable.

The two desperately try to get her attention, and her friend's attention that comes over also while at the size of a flea.
